issues.title: Add dark mode toggle to user preferences
issues.body:
Users have been requesting a dark mode option for better accessibility and reduced eye strain during extended usage.

- [x] highlighted
- [x] changelog
- [ ] breaking
- [ ] deprecation

## Release Note

Introduced a dark mode toggle in user preferences, allowing users to switch between light and dark themes. The setting is automatically saved and persists across sessions.

issues.title: Fix memory leak in background sync process
issues.body:
Background sync was consuming excessive memory over time, causing performance degradation.

- [ ] highlighted
- [x] changelog
- [ ] breaking
- [ ] deprecation

## Release Note

Fixed a memory leak in the background synchronization process that was causing gradual performance degradation. Users should notice improved stability during long sessions.

issues.title: Implement OAuth2 authentication flow
issues.body:
Replace basic auth with OAuth2 for improved security and third-party integrations.

- [x] highlighted
- [x] changelog
- [x] breaking
- [ ] deprecation

## Release Note

Implemented OAuth2 authentication flow to replace basic authentication. This provides enhanced security and enables seamless integration with third-party services.

**Breaking Change:** Basic authentication will be deprecated in v1.2.0. Please migrate to OAuth2 before then.

issues.title: Add keyboard shortcuts for common actions
issues.body:
Power users want keyboard shortcuts for frequently used actions to improve workflow efficiency.

- [ ] highlighted
- [x] changelog
- [ ] breaking
- [ ] deprecation

## Release Note

Added keyboard shortcuts for common actions:
- `Ctrl+N` / `Cmd+N`: Create new item
- `Ctrl+S` / `Cmd+S`: Save current work
- `Ctrl+F` / `Cmd+F`: Open search
- `Esc`: Close modals/dialogs

issues.title: Deprecate legacy API endpoints
issues.body:
Several API endpoints are being deprecated in favor of new, more efficient versions.

- [ ] highlighted
- [x] changelog
- [ ] breaking
- [x] deprecation

## Release Note

The following legacy API endpoints are now deprecated and will be removed in v1.3.0:

- `/api/v1/users` → Use `/api/v2/users` instead
- `/api/v1/projects` → Use `/api/v2/projects` instead
- `/api/v1/tasks` → Use `/api/v2/tasks` instead

The new endpoints provide better performance and additional features.
